Class Bundle

java.lang.Object
cop4331.model.Bundle
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProductComponent
public class Bundle extends Object implements ProductComponent

Represents a collection of products bundled together and sold as a single unit. Implements the ProductComponent interface. Provides functionality to manage the bundled products.

Author:
Denry Ormejuste, Benjamin Carver

      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Bundle.
      discountPercentage - The discount applied to the Bundle.
      productList - A list of products to be bundled.

      public void addProductToBundle(Product product)

      Adds a product to the Bundle.

      Parameters:

      IllegalArgumentException - If product is null or if product is already in the Bundle.
